Title: Day 8: 8:00 P.M. - 9:00 P.M.
Plot: Four explosive hours after being unwillingly drawn back into action, Jack Bauer reteams with a risky Renee Walker to track some very dangerous leads. Meanwhile, back at CTU, a desperate Dana Walsh faces tense and untimely circumstances, and emotions escalate when President Taylor learns of a larger looming threat that jeopardizes the peace accord with President Hassan.
Writer: Howard Gordon, Evan Katz, Alex Gansa
GuestStars: Kiefer Sutherland, Cherry Jones, Mary Lynn Rajskub
